医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究人员获得 270 万美元资助，用于研究挥之不去的莱姆病症状据估计，平均每天有 1,200 名美国人被诊断患有莱姆病。其中一些患者即使在治疗后仍然会受到负面影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Researcher-receives-2427-million-grant-to-study-lingering-Lyme-disease-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Researcher-receives-2427-million-grant-to-study-lingering-Lyme-disease-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=48e16457-a8eb-4f4f-81e0-30ad4875b880 Fri, 14 Jul 2023 14:48:22 -0400 Researcher receives $2.7 million grant to study lingering Lyme disease symptoms
灵长类脑细胞图谱为神经回路研究提供分子和细胞基础近百名科学家组成的团队近日利用自主研发的空间转录组测序技术Stereo-seq和snRNA-seq技术，绘制了猕猴皮质中的细胞类型分类图，并揭示了细胞类型组成与灵长类各脑区之间的关系，这为进一步研究神经回路提供了分子和细胞基础。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Primate-brain-cell-atlas-provides-molecular-and-cellular-basis-for-neural- Circuit-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Primate-brain-cell-atlas-provides-molecular-and-cellular-basis-for-neural- Circuit-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=27932f1d-758a-4de6-b565-ce2ba512b5dc Fri, 14 Jul 2023 14:44:46 -0400 Primate brain cell atlas provides molecular and cellular basis for neural circuit research
研究发现疗养院未充分利用新冠病毒抗病毒治疗疗养院是新冠病毒大流行期间的一个关键战场，优先分配个人防护装备、疫苗和新冠病毒检测试剂盒。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/COVID-antiviral-treatments-underused-in-nursing-homes-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/COVID-antiviral-treatments-underused-in-nursing-homes-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=65619600-acfb-480b-bc0d-062259f53338 Fri, 14 Jul 2023 14:40:46 -0400 COVID antiviral treatments underused in nursing homes, study finds
新的脂质“特征”可以帮助识别有先兆子痫风险的女性弗吉尼亚大学医学院的研究人员发现了一种方法来识别孕妇是否有先兆子痫的风险，先兆子痫是一种以高血压和肾功能障碍为特征的严重疾病，可能导致早产、癫痫发作甚至死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/New-lipid-signature-could-help-identify-women-at-risk-of-preeclampsia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/New-lipid-signature-could-help-identify-women-at-risk-of-preeclampsia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=81118464-4c72-4d79-9c06-3156c7f5e6ba Fri, 14 Jul 2023 14:35:42 -0400 New lipid 'signature' could help identify women at risk of preeclampsia
阿斯巴甜摄入量和癌症风险：您需要了解的内容阿斯巴甜是一种低热量甜味剂，其甜度约为糖的 200 倍，用于替代糖并为低能量食品或不添加糖的食品提供甜味。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Aspartame-intake-and-cancer-risk-What-you-need-to-know.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Aspartame-intake-and-cancer-risk-What-you-need-to-know.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dbbd9aae-3085-4174-bbae-fbb9b0e60f8e Fri, 14 Jul 2023 14:27:47 -0400 Aspartame intake and cancer risk: What you need to know
人工智能驱动的药物发现为胱氨酸病患者带来希望人工智能在药物发现中变得越来越重要。大数据、学习算法和强大计算机的使用取得了进步，现在使苏黎世大学 (UZH) 的研究人员能够更好地了解一种严重的代谢疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/AI-powered-drug-discovery-offers-hope-for-cystinosis-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/AI-powered-drug-discovery-offers-hope-for-cystinosis-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d4d78bda-1c9b-455a-a041-cafc47688448 Fri, 14 Jul 2023 14:11:43 -0400 AI-powered drug discovery offers hope for cystinosis patients
养宠物可能不利于患有严重精神疾病的人的心理健康研究人员表示，与伴侣动物一起生活并保持密切联系并不一定会给患有严重精神疾病的人带来显着的心理健康改善。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Pet-ownership-may-not-be-beneficial-for-mental-health-of-people-with-serious-mental-illness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Pet-ownership-may-not-be-beneficial-for-mental-health-of-people-with-serious-mental-illness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c3e63150-988b-46e7-87ab-90c407369280 Fri, 14 Jul 2023 14:01:27 -0400 Pet ownership may not be beneficial for mental health of people with serious mental illness
锻炼可以改善透析患者的生活质量并减少住院次数在透析期间进行轻度运动的患者比不进行轻度运动的患者身体更健康，入院的频率也更低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Exercise-can-improve-quality-of-life-and-reduce-hospitalizations-for-dialysis-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Exercise-can-improve-quality-of-life-and-reduce-hospitalizations-for-dialysis-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dfaedd5e-ab30-4736-a897-e1bec05c3940 Fri, 14 Jul 2023 13:57:56 -0400 Exercise can improve quality of life and reduce hospitalizations for dialysis patients
研究：有同理心的人更有可能支持国际共享冠状病毒疫苗一项新的研究显示，具有更多同理心和国际化信念的人更有可能支持新冠病毒疫苗的国际共享。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Study-Empathetic-people-more-likely-to-support-the-international-sharing-of-coronavirus-vaccines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Study-Empathetic-people-more-likely-to-support-the-international-sharing-of-coronavirus-vaccines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=79616764-1549-4175-a796-8f72d54f9689 Fri, 14 Jul 2023 13:50:57 -0400 Study: Empathetic people more likely to support the international sharing of coronavirus vaccines
澳大利亚研究人员发现 COVID-19 如何感染人类胎盘在《自然细胞生物学》上发表的一项具有里程碑意义的研究中，由莫纳什大学和阿德莱德大学的 Jose Polo 教授以及墨尔本大学 Peter Doherty 感染和免疫研究所 (Doherty Institute) 的 Kanta Subbarao 教授领导的澳大利亚研究人员揭示了如何COVID-19 可感染人类胎盘。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Australian-researchers-discover-how-COVID-19-can-infect-the- human-placenta.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Australian-researchers-discover-how-COVID-19-can-infect-the- human-placenta.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aebf38ae-cb27-4118-9c9d-e25f0f4cde93 Fri, 14 Jul 2023 13:45:10 -0400 Australian researchers discover how COVID-19 can infect the human placenta
